title: Final UK greenhouse gas emissions national statistics: 1990 to 2020
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
description: Final estimates of UK territorial greenhouse gas emissions.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to link for dataset under heading "Documents". Landing page updated to provisional 2020 for Climate change project. Original landing page https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/final-uk-greenhouse-gas-emissions-national-statistics-1990-to-2019
sizingNotes: Multiple tabs, multiple dimensions and multiple footnotes. Simple table structures but various types of tables. CSV available.
notes: Dataset also used for Climate Change Platform Project
